name: Travel Dhikr
description: Protective remembrances for safe and blessed journeys

dhikrs.title: Dua for Beginning a Journey
dhikrs.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ
dhikrs.transliteration: Subhanal-ladhi sakhkhara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrineen wa inna ila rabbina la munqaliboon
dhikrs.translation: Glory unto Him Who created this transportation for us though we were unable to create it on our own. And unto our Lord we shall return.

dhikrs.title: Takbir While Ascending
dhikrs.benefits: Remembering Allah's greatness while ascending hills or high places

dhikrs.title: Tasbih While Descending
dhikrs.benefits: Glorifying Allah while descending or going downhill

dhikrs.title: Seeking Protection During Travel
dhikrs.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِ هَذِهِ السَّفَرِ وَخَيْرِ مَا فِيهَا وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا وَشَرِّ مَا فِيهَا
dhikrs.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min khayri hadhihis-safari wa khayri ma fiha wa a'udhu bika min sharriha wa sharri ma fiha
dhikrs.translation: O Allah, I ask You for the goodness of this journey and the good that is in it, and I seek refuge with You from its evil and the evil that is in it.
